summary: A dishonest insurance salesman's life quickly disintegrates during a Wisconsin winter when he teams up with a psychopath to steal a rare violin at the home of a reclusive farmer.
cast: Greg Kinnear|John Paul Gamoke|David Harbour|Jennifer Edwards-Hughes|Scott Crouch|Peter Moore|Michelle Hutchison|James Michael Detmar|Michael Paul Levin|Kathryn Lawrey|Joe Minjares|Michelle Arthur|Peter Thoemke|Alan Arkin|Lea Thompson|Bob Balaban|Alan Johnson|Alec George|Billy Crudup|Tony Papenfuss|Sue Scott|Terry Hempleman|Chris Carlson|John Elsen|Gary Groomes|Isabell O'Connor|Mike Hagerty|Wayne Morton|Peggy O'Connell|Johnny Hagen|Didja|Gibson|Eleanor Cole|Frank Crandell|Connie Newville|Dj Quaile|Derek Spartz|Landyn Banx|Matt Bappe|Donna Marie Beard|Ernest Briggs|Keri Bunkers|Michael Cook|Angie Dahlager|Ross Destiche|Fredrika Dukes|Devon A Early|John Edel|Joel Edwards|Ryan J. title: Timo bajo cero
